medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Abdominal pain started yesterday and was accompanied by nausea and vomiting (last episode yesterday) nonbloody bilious. The patient reported a large bowel movement yesterday after receiving dulcolax. Temperature was noted to rise up to 100 degrees. Patient has persistent nausea and diffuse abdominal pain, which is not worse in any particular area.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Multiple CVAs, multiple DVTs s/p IVC filter, aphasia, G-tube for dysphagia, constipation, anxiety, GERD, generalized pain, hyperlipidemia, insomnia, personality disorder, history of basilar artery dissection and aneurysms.
